org.jetel.connection.nosql

Interface ReplacementHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReplacementHelper, DefaultReplacementHelper

    public interface ReplacementHelper

    • Method Detail

      • getMatcher

        java.util.regex.Matcher getMatcher(java.lang.String input)
        Creates a Matcher for the given input string.
        Parameters:
        input -
        Returns:
        a new Matcher for the input

      • appendReplacement

        void appendReplacement(java.lang.StringBuffer sb,
                     java.util.regex.Matcher matcher,
                     DataRecord values)
        Analogous to Matcher.appendReplacement(StringBuffer, String).
        1. Appends to the target StringBuffer the input starting from the current Matcher position up to the beginning of the next match.
        2. Appends the replacement value from the referenced field of the DataRecord.
        3. Updates Matcher position.
        Parameters:
        sb - target StringBuffer
        matcher - the Matcher used for string substitution
        values - DataRecord containing the replacement values
        See Also:
        Matcher.appendReplacement(StringBuffer, String)
